text: læa meux phwk cea pliktaw xxk hang cak phwk khea læa sing thi phwk khea khearph bucha xun ca kxallxh læw dangnan phwk cea k cng hlb kheapi nı tha phraphupenceakhxng phwk cea ca thrng phæ khwam metta khxng phraxngkh kæ phwk cea læa ca thrng thahı kickar khxng phwk cea danein pi xyang sadwk sbay
